Date: Thursday, 6/5/1993
Subject: Progress of Chad Curtis
Dear Sir,
Chad Curtis has nothing more to prove at AA Reading Phillies!
He has an AVG of .277 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of John Rocker
Dear Sir,
John Rocker is doing pretty good at A Clearwater Phillies!
He has an ERA of 3.86, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
